item.title: Markdown everywhere!
item.description: According to Wikipedia: Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. It is designed so that it can be converted to HTML and many other formats using a tool by the same name Markdown is often used to format readme files, for writing messages in online discussion forums, and to create rich text using a plain text editor.
